participant_1.background:
I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
my favorite movie genre is horror.
i am a mother of two.
I value my fitness tracker most of all, because it helps me stay active and healthy.
i do not have a car.

participant_2.background:
I adopted my two cats from the local shelter
i was a mechanic for 6 years.
I am glad that my wife's cancer is in remission and that she is able to enjoy the outdoors with me.
I have 2 sisters, but I'm not sure if my car is sentient.
i like to attend wine tours.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder. How are you doing today?

I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm glad to hear that you're managing your anxiety disorder. I'm a mechanic by trade, but I've been on leave for the past 6 months to help my wife who's recovering from cancer.
Oh wow, I'm so sorry to hear about your wife's cancer. But I'm glad to hear that she's in remission! I'm sure she's very grateful to have you by her side.
Thanks! She is, and I'm grateful to be here for her.
That's wonderful. I'm sure you're both looking forward to getting back to your normal lives.
In the meantime, what have you been doing to pass the time?
Well, we've been spending a lot of time together, going on walks, watching movies, and just enjoying each other's company. We've also been doing a lot of home improvement projects.
That sounds lovely. I'm glad you're able to spend some quality time together.
Do you have any plans for the future?
We're not sure yet, but we're thinking about going on a trip soon. We've been looking at some places in Europe.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time.
Thanks! We're looking forward to it.
